column4: hi everybody. it's my first day on debian coming from gentoo. how can I install streamtuner? apt-get install streamtuner doesn't work out.
whatever you do, don't use debian repos
I suppose in that wiki also has a guide to kernel-building? I have no floppy and the kernel freaks out from time to time. I have to disable that. unfortunately the fdd-driver  is not a module
there's a kernal howto, yes - hang on a tic
well, it's best to do things "the Debian Way" in Ubuntu
ok. Ill try. uh. one more thing: what's the security updates repository? .. just hotfixes?
as the name would imply - security fixes
